parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Kodi

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Web socket service port
parameter.description: Port for the web socket service

parameter.name: httpUser
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: User name to access HTTP service.

parameter.name: httpPassword
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to access the HTTP service.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval to poll Kodi API (in s).

parameter.name: notificationTimeout
parameter.label: Notification Timeout
parameter.description: Maximum amount of time for which the notification will be played (in s).

parameter.name: notificationVolume
parameter.label: Notification Sound Volume
parameter.description: Specifies the volume applied to a notification sound (in %).

parameter.name: group
parameter.label: PVR channel group
parameter.description: The PVR channel group name used to identify the channel id.
